name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Android Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **Java**, **Kotlin**, and **Android SDK**, with extensive knowledge of **Android architecture**, **Bluetooth LE**, and **Coroutines**. Experienced with **diagnostic tools** and **unit testing** methodologies to ensure robust application performance.
Strong background in **C** and **C++**, coupled with expertise in **Linux** to optimize Android applications. Proven ability to communicate effectively in English and collaborate within cross-functional teams. Beyond mobile development, well-versed in deploying web applications using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, while leveraging **FastAPI** and **Django** for backend solutions. Skilled in implementing **microservices**, **event-driven architectures**, and **CI/CD pipelines** within cloud environments such as **AWS** and **Azure**. Adept at ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS while integrating AI/ML solutions for enhanced decision-making.
